push_data_size.title: Push data buffer size
push_data_size.description: Buffers results into vector (array) before pushing to a dataset. This prevents overwhelming Apify API.

max_concurrency.title: Max concurrency
max_concurrency.description: Sets the maximum concurrency (parallelism) for the crawl.

max_request_retries.title: Max request retries
max_request_retries.description: Sets the maximum number of retries for each request(URL).

debug_log.title: Debug log
debug_log.description: Shows when each URL starts and ends scraping with timings. Don't use for larger fast runs.

proxy_settings.title: Proxy configuration
proxy_settings.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler.

force_cloud.title: Force cloud
force_cloud.description: This allows local runs to use cloud storage, just for testing. On platform this has no effect.
